description: Verify that the Edit Profile page loads correctly when accessing /profile/edit with authenticated user
scenario: Logged-in user navigates to edit profile page to modify their account information
expected_results: Display the complete edit profile page with form fields pre-populated with current user data
procedure:
1. Login with valid user credentials
2. Navigate to profile page
3. Click 'Edit Profile' button
4. Verify navigation to http://localhost:5000/profile/edit
5. Check page title displays 'Edit Profile'
6. Verify form fields are pre-populated with current user data
7. Check all form sections are visible and properly styled

description: Verify current password field displays correctly as required security measure
scenario: User must enter current password to confirm identity before making changes
expected_results: Display current password field with required indicator and security explanation
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Verify 'Current Password' label with red asterisk (*)
3. Check field has type='password' and required attributes
4. Verify placeholder text 'Enter your current password to confirm changes'
5. Check help text 'Required to verify your identity before making any changes'
6. Verify field is visually distinct as required
7. Test field styling and focus effects
8. Check divider separator above field (border-t border-gray-200)

description: Verify current password verification prevents unauthorized changes
scenario: User must provide correct current password to make any profile changes
expected_results: Changes are blocked if current password is incorrect
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Make valid changes to username or email
3. Enter incorrect current password
4. Click 'Update Profile' button
5. Verify error 'Current password is incorrect.'
6. Check user remains on edit profile page
7. Enter correct current password
8. Verify changes are accepted and processed
9. Test current password verification for all change scenarios

description: Verify edit profile page loads efficiently with optimal performance
scenario: User accesses edit profile page and expects fast loading times
expected_results: Page loads within acceptable time limits with all styling and functionality
procedure:
1. Clear browser cache
2. Open browser developer tools Performance tab
3. Navigate to edit profile page
4. Record page load time and performance metrics
5. Verify total load time is under 2 seconds
6. Check First Contentful Paint (FCP) is under 1 second
7. Verify Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) is acceptable
8. Test page load on slower network connections
9. Check for render-blocking resources
10. Verify animations don't impact performance significantly

description: Verify edit profile page meets accessibility standards (WCAG)
scenario: User with disabilities accesses edit profile page using assistive technologies
expected_results: Page is fully accessible with proper labels, ARIA attributes, and keyboard navigation
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Test keyboard navigation through all form elements
3. Verify tab order is logical (username → email → new password → confirm → current → submit)
4. Check all form fields have proper labels
5. Test form with screen reader software
6. Verify focus indicators are visible and clear
7. Check color contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards
8. Test error messages are announced by screen readers
9. Verify form validation errors are accessible
10. Check required field indicators are properly marked
11. Test help text associations with form fields
